Solo Settings

In addition to our standard two piece setup, Shaun also provides solo performances on classical guitar. These performances are much more intimate in nature and add a wonderful level of ambiance to any event. The setlist for these events is a mixture of standard classical guitar repertoire, along with a host of carefully selected song arrangements.
